import React, { Fragment, useState }from 'react' import Calculators from './Calculators' const INITIAL_STATE = { waist:'', weight:'', gender: '', } const Ymca = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(INITIAL_STATE); const { waist, weight, gender } = formData; const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); showMessage(); clearMessage(); } const showMessage = () => { let result; if (gender === 'Female' ) { result = Math.ceil(( (4.15 * Math.ceil(waist)) - (0.082 * Math.ceil(weight)) - 76.76)/weight * 100) } else if (gender === 'Male' ) { result = Math.ceil(( (4.15 * Math.ceil(waist)) - (0.082 * Math.ceil(weight)) - 98.42)/weight * 100) }; document.getElementById('result').style.display = 'block' document.getElementById('ymca').innerHTML = "Your Body Fat (%): " + result; } const clearMessage = () => { setTimeout(() => { document.getElementById('result').style.display = 'none'; setFormData(INITIAL_STATE); }, 4000) } return (

YMCA Body Fat Percentage Calculator

This calculator uses the formula developed by the YMCA to estimate your body fat percentage without calipers. Use a tape measure and enter your waist measurement. Combine the waist measurement with your gender and weight and this calculator will estimate your percent of body fat, how much of your weight is lean mass and how much is fat mass, and your general fitness category.

Waist size: (cm)

onChange(e)}/>

Weight: (kg)

onChange(e)}/>
BFP Category Women Men
Essential Fat precent 10 - 13% 2 - 5%
Fat Percent for Athletes 14 - 20% 6 - 13%
Fitness Level 21 - 24% 14 - 17%
Average Level 25 - 31% 18 - 24%
Obese Level > 32% > 25%
) } export default Ymca
